title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS TOYOTA HILUX / FORTUNER N80 (2015+) FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS TOYOTA HILUX / FORTUNER N80 (2015+) FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT

Western Filters Toyota Hilux / Fortuner N80 (2015+) Fuel Manager Pre-filter Water Separator Kit available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Fuel Manager Pre Filter Kit suits:

  • Toyota Hilux / Fortuner N80 2.4L 2.8L Diesel
  • GUN-126R EGR 1GD-FTV 2GD-FTV (nov.2015 on)

So what is a Fuel Manager ?
The Fuel Manager is a diesel fuel filter / water separator system. Best used as a Pre Filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. A Fuel Manager basic assembly consists of a cast aluminum header with two inlet and two outlet female threaded ports for fuel line connections. Normally, only one inlet and one outlet are required. (The flexible design offers a choice. Unused ports should be plugged). Attached to the header is the element, which contains the media to remove water & other contaminants. Kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need and even where to fit it!

PLEASE NOTE: Only for single battery models

Check out the full range of products available for your Toyota Hilux or Toyota Fortuner!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
